Package camzup.core

Class Color.MixHsl

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Color.AbstrEasing
camzup.core.Color.MixHsl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Utils.EasingFuncObj<Color>, Utils.QuadFunction<Color,Color,Float,Color,Color>
Enclosing class:
Color
public static class Color.MixHsl extends Color.AbstrEasing
Eases between colors by hue, saturation and lightness.

    MixHsl(Color.HueEasing hueFunc)

  • Constructor Details

    • MixHsl

      public MixHsl()
      The default constructor. Creates a mixer with nearest hue interpolation and linear interpolation for saturation and lightness.

    • MixHsl

      public MixHsl(Color.HueEasing hueFunc)
      Creates a color HSL mixing function with the given easing functions for hue.
      Parameters:
      hueFunc - the hue easing function
